AD_Field.Name: Active
AD_Field.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

AD_Field.Name: Open Balance
AD_Field.Description: Total Open Balance Amount in primary Accounting Currency
AD_Field.Help: The Total Open Balance Amount is the calculated open item amount for Customer and Vendor activity. If the Balance is below zero, we owe the Business Partner. The amount is used for Credit Management. Invoices and Payment Allocations determine the Open Balance (i.e. not Orders or Payments).

AD_Field_Trl.Help:
La cantidad abierta total del balance es la cantidad abierta calculada del art칤culo para la actividad del cliente y del proveedor. Si el equilibrio est치 debajo de cero, debemos al tercero. El importe se utiliza para la gerencia de cr칠dito. Las facturas y las asignaciones del pago determinan el equilibrio abierto (es decir no las 칩rdenes o los pagos).

AD_Field.Name: Active
AD_Field.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Hay dos m칠todos para que los registros no est칠n disponibles en el sistema: Uno es eliminar el registro; el otro es desactivarlo. Un registro desactivado no est치 disponible para selecci칩n; pero est치 disponible para Informes
AD_Field_Trl.Description: El registro est치 activo en el sistema
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Activo

AD_Field.Name: Vendor Service Liability
AD_Field.Help: The Vendor Service Liability account indicates the account to use for recording service liabilities. It is used if you need to distinguish between Liability for products and services. This account is only used, if posting to service accounts is enabled in the accounting schema.

AD_Field.Name: Client
AD_Field.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
